mutants.code:
import string

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = s.translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.punctuation)).replace(' ', '').lower()
    start = 1
    end = len(s) - 1
    while start < end:
        if s[start] != s[end]:
            return False
        start += 1
        end -= 1
    return True
